atomicapp.containers.LoginPage.headline: Welcome to Atomic Dex
atomicapp.containers.LoginPage.subheadin: Please type in your Seed to Login to your existing Account
atomicapp.containers.LoginPage.new_accou: Click Here to Create a New Account
atomicapp.containers.SeedPage.title: Generate a new Passphrase/Seed
atomicapp.containers.SeedPage.instructio: Click on Generate to create your New Account details. Once your new login data is generated and shown in the box below please back up your Seed and your WIF key to a secure place. Without this data you will NOT be able to access your funds/tokens.. If your lose your Seed you will also lose all your funds/addresses associated with this Seed. The Seed is the password that gains you access to your funds/tokens on the blockchain.
